title: April fool day

embed.description: April fool day illustration by HolyElfGirl

body: I want to you my april fool illustration : )

replies.body:
Sona with a mean streak a mile wide!  Poor Nami and her fish buddies!

Part of me really *really* hopes that's a fake fish she's dangling there.  Maybe a rubberized squeaky one?  I think that's what I'm going to choose to believe.
Those expressions! Even on the fish! Love it.... I do feel like that would be more in character for PentaKill Sona.
Sona being that mean seems a little fishy to me.........
